dialog: What the fuck are you thinking?
There's a black guy outside breaking into your car.
How long has he been there?
Not right now, honey. How many?
What the fuck is going on?
Stay right here and be quiet.
I don't have a personal problem with him.
You hate this child, and I think I know why.
I went out with his mother a few times.
That paper Bob, it's a travesty.
Arguing for Hitler as a civil rights hero.
You've got to draw the line.
on any book that related to the struggle for civil rights...
I am not disputing the fact that the child is confused...
but I am not ready to give up on him yet.
His brother probably put him up to it.
his brother did not put him up to this.
I find that hard to believe.
I know he was a good kid...
and it's a shame what he's been through, but that's dangerous.
he learned this nonsense, and he can unlearn it, too.
I will not give up on this child yet.
Derek got out this morning, did he not?
He was one of my students.
He was a brilliant student like you...
but he hung out with fools, also like you.
Did you bring me in here to talk about Derek?
What happened to him has nothing to do with me.
Everything you do right now has something to do with Derek.
Go ahead. You don't think I could handle it?
No. I think the street would kill you.
aren't going to save you out there.
I'm your history teacher from now on.
is to prepare for me a new paper due tomorrow.
Come on, Sweeney. It took me a week to read "Mein Kampf." What do you want me to do it on?
I want you to analyze and interpret all the events...
How these events helped shape your present perspective...
The impact on your life, your family's.
Whatever you want to say, Danny.
I'll be the only one reading it.
But if it's not on my desk tomorrow morning...
you are a ghost at Venice Beach High.
I never cheated in my life.
Now why you all kicking it like that?
You lucky I gotta go to class.
He don't wanna see me and the heater.
I would have clocked that white boy.
You gotta fucking stand up for yourself.
We got a whole file on skinheads here.
Actually, he's done a stretch at Y.A.
This guy C.C., is that him?
This morning we have a guest, and there he is.
This here is Dr. Bob Sweeney.
He's principal over at Venice Beach High.
For some time now, he's been doing outreach work...
with gangs both in and out of the can.
Three years ago, a local kid named Derek Vinyard...
was sent up for murdering a couple of Crips...
who were trying to jack his car.
Bob taught Vinyard, and he's followed this case closely.
Here you go. Have a looksee.
Cameron Alexander, well, he's a Venice Beach landmark.
He's the biggest distributor and writer...
of White Power literature and videos in L.A. County.
He promotes White Power bands, he writes reviews...
and in his spare time, this guy even writes hate columns.
Been trying to pin something to him, but it doesn't work.
He runs everything out of his house by the beach.
There were no white gangs in Venice Beach...
before Cameron Alexander and Derek Vinyard hooked up.
Alexander found in Derek his shining prince.
Essentially, he used Derek to recruit...
a slew of insecure, frustrated, and impressionable kids.
This kid Vinyard, he's got a lot of baggage...
as you'll see on this tape we've gotten courtesy of NBC.
Earlier today, L.A. County firefighter Dennis Vinyard...
was shot and killed battling a blaze...
at a suspected Compton drug den.
We're at the Vinyard home now...
and Lieutenant Vinyard's oldest son Derek...
has agreed to talk with us for a moment.
Derek, if you could come down here please for a second.
Look, I know this is tough, but how do you feel right now?
How do you think I feel?
Well, this country's becoming a haven for criminals...
Decent hardworking Americans like my dad...
are getting rubbed out by social parasites.
You think maybe your father's murder was racerelated?
Every problem in this country is racerelated.
Those are problems of the black community...
the Hispanic community, the Asian community.
Aren't those really issues that deal more with poverty?
No. They're not products of their environments.
Minorities don't give two shits about this country.
They come here to exploit it, not to embrace it.
Millions of white Europeans came here and flourished...
What the fuck is the matter with these people?
They have to go around shooting at firemen.
What does this have to do with the murder of your father?
Because my father was murdered doing his job!
Putting out a fire in a fucking nigger neighborhood...
he shouldn't have given a shit about.
He got shot by a fucking drug dealer...
who probably still collects a welfare check.
Derek Vinyard was quietly released from Chino...
early this morning after serving three and some odd years.
I think this is something we gotta keep an eye on.
things could get very ugly down by the beach.
Venice Beach didn't always look like this.
It used to be a great neighborhood.
The boardwalk's always been a dump...
but when my dad moved us out here...
Venice was a nice, quiet place to grow up.
Over the years, though, it's just gone to hell.
The gangs are like a plague.
They moved west from Inglewood and South Central...
I ain't got time for all this bullshit.
Yo, is that that fool you was telling me about?
That's why Derek started the D.O.C.
He said white kids shouldn't have to walk around scared...
in their own neighborhood, and for a while there...
we really made it like it was ours again.
Look at this fucking jungle bunny.
He does a spin move every time.
What the fuck you Who you calling boy, motherfucker?
I'm through monkeying around with your fucking ass!
A hundred bucks say I make you my bitch.
He's trying to make ends meet...
When I want your opinion, I'll ask for it.
Come on. I can't cover this.
You got a big fucking mouth.
I can take this niglet down.
Yo, I ain't got time for this.
I come in this game right now.
but we play black guys against the white guys.
And not just today. For good.
If you win, we will walk away...
but if we win, no bitching, no fighting.
Right here in front of everybody, pack up your shit...
and get your black asses out of here.
Seth, get back and play some "D." Defense!
You want to go, I'm ready!
You want to go, Adolf Hitler wannabe motherfucker?
You gotta call offense on that shit.
You can't let those niggers get away with that shit.
Get the fuck off my court!
Get the fuck out of here!
Derek wouldn't let us visit him in prison.
He said it would make it just too hard for him...
and that if we came, he wouldn't see us anyhow.
Three years without him, just wondering.
we picked him up outside the gate.
The whole ride back, he didn't say anything.
I wanted to stay home, but he said...
I'll see you later." Oh, come on.
What? You too big to give me a hug, tough guy?
No, man. I just know you're gonna need someone...
to look after you while you adjust to all this space.
This place is smaller than the old living room.
You gotta do something about that hair.
You took it all the way down.
It hurt like shit when they put it on.
I got it about a month ago.
Is there a phone in the back?
I'll get it in the back.
My eyes have seen the glory...
of the trampling at the zoo.
We've washed ourselves in nigger's blood...
We're taking down the Zog machine...
You think our friend was behind that?
I'm gonna take care of that tonight.
My sweet kids. My baby boy.
God, what's with the love fest, you guys?
I'll make sure he does it.
I came to see the man.
Can you fit through the door?
What's up, Dan? How you doing?
Hang on. Give me a minute.
I'll be out in a minute.
I'm not gonna stay in my room the rest of my life.
Hey. What the fuck is Seth doing here?
No. He always comes over here.
You calling me a blimp, you fucking Democrat?
When was the last time you were actually able to see your feet?
Are you going to Cam's party tonight?
Let me ask you a few questions.
Tell me some of the shit you've learned, fuckass...
OK. I believe in death, destruction...
Cut the shit, Dan. Come on.
Tell me what I want to hear.
You mean that shit about your mother?
You want to get fucking beaten, Danny?
I'm not fucking talking to you.
Look, you gotta let me do this my own way, all right?
I hate anyone that isn't white Protestant.
They're a burden to the advancement of the white race.
None of them are fucking all right, OK?
They're all a bunch of fucking freeloaders.
What don't you like about them...
and say it with some fucking conviction.
I hate the fact it's cool to be black these days.
I hate this hiphop influence on white fucking suburbia.
I hate Tabitha Soren and her Zionist MTV fucking pigs...
telling us we should get along.
Save the rhetorical bullshit, Hillary Rodham Clinton...
That's some of the best shit I've ever heard.
I feel sorry for you, Danny.
You don't believe any of that shit, right?
No. Get out of the house now, you piece of shit.
Is that any way to talk to a guest, a friend?
Derek hates you, and you don't realize it.
How do you know who I hate?
God, I think you lost weight.
I can get my arms almost all the way around you.
Look at this hair. Holy shit.
I told him it's gotta go.
Let's get the fuck out of here.
I want to talk to him.
Hey, listen. Did you pull some shit in school today?
This kid is awesome as hell.
Did you turn in a paper on "Mein Kampf"?
Was that your idea or did Cameron put you up to that?
No. I thought it would be cool.
It doesn't matter how I knew.
This kid is smart as hell.
Was that Sweeney on the phone?
God, I hate that fucking nigger, man.
He's gotta get a fucking life.
Sweeney is a nigger on a power trip.
That's what he was like when we were there...
and that's how he is now.
I want to talk to my brother.
He kills bugs for a living.
You don't want to be like that.
You can learn a lot from him.
Don't go fuck it up with small fry shit like that.
You got to see the bullshit paper he's making me write.
He told me all about it.
You do anything he tells you to do. I mean it.
I don't want you getting in trouble in school...
trying to impress me, taking this shit in there.
Do you understand what I'm saying?
Yeah, I guess, but, I mean, I thought you'd be happy.
I'll talk to you about this later.
and you're blowing this in her face all day.
I want to talk to you.
I was just yelling at him for blowing smoke in your face.
Nice thing to come home to, huh?
Look, you got to take it easy.
You got to get some rest.
Take Danny's and my room, and we'll hit the couch.
I've been on the couch for ages.
We gotta get out of here.
We all gotta get out of here.
I could drop out and get a job.
Derek, can we please go eat?
Go wait in the living room.
I want him out of my house.
I got to do that paper.
I'll catch up with you later tonight.
Not at Cameron's. I need you to stay away from there.
I just need you to stay away from the party, all right?
Promise me you'll stay away from that party tonight.
I'm not fucking 14 anymore, all right?
It didn't take long for Derek to make a name for himself...
and Cameron knew just how to use it.
You don't want to stick around?
You know I'd love to, but I got to be careful.
I'll see you back at the house.
He sent Derek to the kids, to the frustrated ones...
the ones who were sick of getting their asses kicked...
Be part of something." All right, let's go.
They did whatever Derek told them to.
Let's go. We're not here to fucking socialize.
We need to open our eyes.
There's over two million illegal immigrants...
bedding down in this state tonight.
This state spent three billion dollars last year...
on services for those people who had no right to be here.
$400 million just to lock up illegal immigrant criminals...
who only got into this country because the INS decided...
it's not worth the effort to screen for convicted felons.
Our government doesn't give a shit.
Our border policy is a joke, so is anybody surprised...
that south of the border they're laughing at us?
Every night, thousands of these parasites...
stream across the border like some fucking piñata exploded.
This is about your life and mine.
falling through the cracks and getting the shaft...
because their government cares more about the rights...
of a bunch of people who aren't even citizens.
On the Statue of Liberty it says...
"Give me your tired, your hungry, your poor." Well, it's Americans who are tired and hungry and poor.
Until you take care of that...
close the fucking book, because we're losing.
We're losing our right to pursue our destiny.
We're losing our freedom so a bunch of fucking foreigners...
can come in here and exploit our country.
And this isn't something that's going on far away.
This isn't happening places we can't do anything about it.
Right in that building behind you.
Archie Miller ran that grocery store since we were kids here.
He went under, and now some fucking Korean owns it...
who fired these guys and is making a killing...
because he hired I see this shit going on...
and I don't see anybody doing anything about it...
and it fucking pisses me off.
Are we going to stand on the sidelines?
Quietly standing there while our country gets raped?
Are we going to ante up and do something about it?
to hire fucking border jumpers, you nip bastard?
We're not going to hurt you.
This bitch stinks. Smells like fish and chips and guacamole.
Get the fuck off me, motherfucker!
Have a fucking bean, you fucking beaner!
Get some of that in there.
That's a great color on you.
Now you can get a white woman's job.
A little better than this one, huh?
Then you'll move up in the world.
No green card, no fucking work.
Dad was gone, but things were almost normal again.
Mom was starting to live a little.
Everyone was feeling so good, we just didn't see it coming.
The irony is that most of the stores...
destroyed during the riots were owned by black people.
It's like an expression of rage...
by people who feel neglected and turned away by the system.
It's like we had in Watts or the riots in Chicago in '68.
Calling a riot an irrational expression of rage.
It's people grabbing any excuse they can find...
to go and loot a store, nothing more.
The fact that these people ripped off the stores...
in their own communities, all that reflects...
is that they have no respect for the law at all...
and certainly no concept of community...
White people commit crimes against white people, too.
Yeah, but they're not offing each other in record numbers.
Look at the statistics, for Christ's sake.
One in every three black males...
is in some phase of the correctional system.
or do these people have a racial commitment to crime?
Maybe it says something about prejudice...
If you want to talk about criminal statistics...
take a look at the social inequalities that produce them.
You're taking one thing and calling it something else...
these people have for their own actions.
It's like saying, it's not a riot, it's rage.
It's exactly what happened in this trial...
because the media twisted things around...
so people got all focused on these cops...
and whether or not they were going to get convicted...
and whether Rodney King's civil rights had been violated.
Everybody lost sight of old Rodney King himself.
The guy's a multiple felon by his own admission.
He's high as a goddamn kite...
driving 120 miles an hour down the highway.
He gets pulled over by a bunch of cops...
That's the bottom line, and he walked.
And there's some yahoo there with a video camera...
who turned it on halfway through...
so that all we see is them hitting him.
You got Powell and Koon cracking him with billy clubs...
and Briseno's kicking him in the back of the skull...
so it looks severe, you know?
People are going, "Oh, this poor guy." This poor guy who attacked four cops...
and those cops end up on the stand...
defending themselves for using standard textbook procedures.
I don't think the tapes showed that at all.
I did think the police used their clubs rather excessively.
Who are you to say what's excessive?
I think it was totally appropriate.
They're in a better position to make that call than you are.
We, as society, grant cops a certain amount of authority...
to make those calls, because we acknowledge...
that their job is difficult and dangerous.
Very few people respect that and respect that authority.
Look who's talking about respectMr. Junior KKK.
You want to go to college?
I didn't say I respect the laws.
I don't respect laws that let Rodney King back on the street.
Second, I am not a member of a lowrent...
disorganized bunch of rednecks like the fucking KKK. Please.
So take your head out of your ass.
If Danny was walking across the street that night...
and Rodney King plowed into him Can we drop this Rodney King thing?
We're having a nice discussion, right?
If Rodney King had been driving along...
hopped up on PCP and had killed Danny...
you'd be singing a different tune I didn't see him hit anybody, and neither did you.
He didn't happen to kill anybody, thank God.
If that fucking monkey had run some kid over...
everybody would have a very different opinion.
They'd be focused on Rodney King and not on these officers.
But instead, he just attacked a few cops...
so, suddenly, it's Hands Across America...
for this fucking total son of a bitch.
We're so hung up on this notion that we have some obligation...
to help this struggling black man.
Cut him some slack until he can overcome...
It's crap. This stuff just perpetuates it...
while our country rots from the inside out.
I mean, Christ, Lincoln freed the slaves 130 years ago.
How long does it take to get your act together?
Jews have been persecuted for over 5,000 years.
Are you saying it's wrong to feel sensitive...
I'm with you. I'm with you all the way, baby.
I'm so sick of these liberal hypocrites.
Look how they scapegoated Chief Gates.
Think they would've come down that hard on Willie Williams?
No way. That videotape was a setup to get rid of Gates.
Who do you think you are?
Be quiet! Shut up! Sit down!
Don't tell him to shut up!
Shut your mouth and give my girlfriend respect.
Derek, what are you trying to prove?
Where do you think you're going?
You need to learn some fucking manners, Davina!
My family, so you know what?
I don't give two shits about you or what you think.
You're not a part of it.
That has nothing to do with it.
You don't think I see what you're doing?
You think I'll sit here and smile...
while some fucking kike tries to fuck my mother?
Not while I'm in this family.
I will fucking cut your Shylock nose off...
and stick it up your ass before I let that happen.
Coming in here and poisoning my family's dinner...
with your Jewish, niggerloving, hippie bullshit.
Bring him to our table, primping your hair and your dress.
How could you bring him to my father's table?
How could you go from Dad to that? Aren't you ashamed?
I'm ashamed that you came out of my body!
Go run to your fucking kike!
He's just a boy without a father.
Doris, you don't know the world your children are living in.
Let me go, God damn it!
I screwed up. I lost control.
What are you doing out of bed?
Yeah? There's a lot of that going around.
I don't even know how we got here sometimes.
I feel like I let you down, only I didn't know when it happened.
You don't get sick from cold.
No. You get sick from smoking.
What are you looking at me like that for?
When are you going to let that beautiful hair grow back?
I'd better get Ally to bed.
You say good night to Mom?
Then you have to go to bed.
I go back to that night again and again in my mind.
I try to stop it from happening.
I want you out of this house.
I'll be gone in the morning.
He can move in with me.
In my mind, I imagine what would've happened...
if I hadn't gone to that room and told him.
Nigger, you just fucked with the wrong bull. Come here!
Should've learned your place on the fucking basketball court...
but you fucking monkeys never get the message!
My father gave me that truck, you motherfucker!
I'm going to teach you a real lesson now, motherfucker.
Put your fucking mouth on the curb.
Put it on the curb right now!
Put your weapon on the ground!
I said get your hands up!
Put your hands behind your head!
Get down on your knees right now!
She ain't gonna open the door?
Someone right fucking there looking at us. Hello?
I'm gonna go get some beers.
Drink up, Danny, before your brother sees you.
Let's go talk to Cameron, Danny.
You are a fucking god, man!
I thought you turned that paper in.
I did. Now fucking Murray turned me in...
so Sweeney's making me write another one.
He's one of those "proud to be nigger" people.
No. He's a manipulative, selfrighteous Uncle Tom.
He's making you feel guilty about writing on Adolf Hitler.
Some nigger, some spic writes about Martin Luther King...
or fucking Cesar commie Chavez gets a pat on the head.
You can see the hypocrisy in that, can't you?
I want to see you, OK?
I do, but I gotta take care of something tonight.
Would you do something with me?
Why would you want to leave?
You're like a god to them.
If we had it good before, wait till you see what it's like now.
I don't want my family involved.
Everything I've done here fucked it all up, understand?
You think what you did was wrong?
Those niggers got exactly what they deserved...
I understand you just got out, but no one's gonna hurt you.
There's a small army out there.
We're not gonna let a bunch of spooks kick us out.
If you want to be with me, just trust me. Come with me.
I don't think you realize what's been going on here.
We are 10 times what we were, and we are bloody organized.
It is like nothing you have ever seen.
This was a mistake. Forget it.
This isn't you. I know you.
You don't know anything about me, Stacey.
Will you tell him Lizzy's looking for him?
We'll let the niggers, kikes, and spics grab for the pie.
Course, they're gonna have to fight to get it.
And if we scare the fuck out of people...
and a few people get killed in the process, so be it.
Gonna put that in your paper, Danny?
What are you doing here, Danny?
I had to check it out.
You knew I was gonna come.
He knows when to go to bed.
This little blonde girl keeps asking for you.
You don't have to watch your ass around here.
The party was a little quick...
but we're just so damn glad you're back, Derek.
It's only natural you should feel a little funny.
You made the fat kid a little nervous.
He thinks the joint messed with your mind.
Things have changed since you've been gone.
Wait'll you see what we've done with the internet.
We've got every gang from Seattle to San Diego...
Only thing we lack is a little overall leadership.
Those people out there got a lot of respect for you.
When you're ready, come talk to me about it.
Yeah, well, I know you grew out of...
that shaved head bullshit a long time ago, thank God.
I like your hair the way it is now.
No more of this fucking grocery store You're not listening to me.
All that bullshit out there and all your bullshit, too.
Don't you fucking talk to me about hard time.
You did two months, then rolled over on two kids...
and let them go down for you.
So don't feed me your fucking lies, Cameron.
Get your head on straight, and then I'll talk to you.
But it doesn't matter if I don't, does it?
lined up and ready to go, you fucking chicken hawk.
I lost three years of my life for your fucking phony cause...
but I am on to you now, you fucking snake.
This isn't some fucking country club you can waltz in and out Shut up! Shut the fuck up!
I came here to tell you one thing. I am out.
Out! And Danny is out, too!
If you come near my family, I'll fucking kill you.
Excuse me, but fuck you, Derek.
You can't come barking threats at me.
You can do whatever you want, but Danny is a good kid.
He's not some whiny pussy like you.
He needs my help, and I'm gonna give it to him.
If you come near Danny again...
I will feed you your fucking heart, Cameron.
I'm more important to him now than you'll ever be.
You're a fucking dead man, Vinyard.
Why don't you share with the rest of us...
what you just said to me, you piece of shit nigger!
Where the fuck are you going?
Back up! Back the fuck up!
Who do you think you are?
Who do you think you are?
I'm sorry. You weren't supposed to see that.
I told you not to come.
God, it wasn't supposed to happen that way.
That's all there is to it.
It just all went to shit.
I can't go back to that, Dan.
Those guys, the gang, that life.
What happened to you up there?
Feed line. Back up for chow.
Don't be late, you piece of shit!
Let's go if you want to eat!
What the fuck's your problem, you assholes?
After two days, I didn't think I'd make it a week.
You want to eat today, you fucking piece of shit?
Hey, you white trash piece of shit!
You think you're fucking special, whitefish?
I'm gonna keep my eye on you, you white piece of shit!
Step forward to chow! Let's go!
All the wrong people knew who I was anyway...
so I figured I'd put up a flag and hope a friend sees it.
That's the cat I'm talking about right there.
Don't fuck with me, all right?
'Cause I'm the most dangerous man in this prison.
We pick 'em up over here, and we store 'em over there.
And I hope you work out, all right?
'Cause the last guy they sent me didn't wear no drawers...
couldn't read the sizes in the drawers...
and used to sniff the drawers, all right?
We got two sizesmedium and large, all right?
All you gotta do is put the mediums with the mediums...
and the larges with the larges, all right?
I know it's a boring job...
but it's better than that last shit they had me doing.
I spent two years in the kitchen scrubbing hotass pots and pans.
That you don't wanna do, all right?
You should be happy as shit you landed this job.
There's no telling what they'd have you do up in the joint.
Probably robbed some old lady, huh?
OK, I know your kind, right?
Let me tell you something, man, you better watch your ass...
'cause in the joint, you the nigger, not me.
He's doing favors for that fucking spic?
Mitch has just got a little something extra...
on the side with them boys, you know?
Somebody should say something to him.
What the fuck is he thinking?
Mitch is the only reason you're not a corpse right now.
I don't fucking give a shit.
I can take care of myself.
I'm getting sick of it, man.
There's a lot of hard talk here and no followthrough.
I think you better chill out on the preaching bullshit.
We're getting a little tired of that shit around here.
What are you doing here, Doris?
Look, I told you I don't want you all coming up here.
I don't care what you told me, OK?
I need to talk to you now.
Davina's great. She's getting straight As almost.
And Ally's walking, starting to talk a little.
He holds you up so high.
He's always bragging about you to Cameron...
He's starting to remind me of you.
Jesus, don't sound so worried, all right?
He's not gonna be a little angel forever.
You think because I watched my firstborn...
fuck up his entire life that I can sit here...
and see my baby follow him down the same toilet?
I can't fix all this shit from up here.
All it does is make me feel bad.
You think you're the only one doing time, Derek?
You think you're here all alone?
You think I'm not in here with you?
Every day I watch you go through these sheets...
like you gonna get to the end of them.
Look, nigger, will you chill the fuck out?
No matter how fast you get through them...
they gonna keep bringing them in and bringing them in.
ain't gonna do a damn thing but give you a heart attack!
But you gonna give me a goddamn heart attack, too!
I know, I'm just a dumb, stupid nigger, right?
I know I ain't the one getting mad at them sheets, though.
As a matter of fact, the only sheets I get mad at...
All right, boy, this is what we gonna do.
We gonna hate some goddamn niggers.
That's all we gonna do is hate some niggers all day.
Don't know what a nigger is, but we gonna hate them.
My cousin Derek is in the pen right now...
working next to a nigger, driving him nigger crazy.
Now we can ignore each other in peace.
"What are you doing?" You know what he tells me?
"It's better than the pig I just tried to fuck." He never lets me finish the joke.
Whatever. She's laying on her back, her legs are open...
He was taking it from the Mexicans...
and dealing it out to his own people.
